resources.string: Hold the phone according to the landscape mode, such that the screen faces the child and is not visible to you. For both, images and videos, flip to get the next one, and for every card, guess the emotion based on how the child enacts it. Capture the child\'s expression for every emotion card using the \'volume down\' button. Make sure the phone is stable while clicking the picture. Also ensure the volume is set appropriately before you enter into the game session because during the game, the volume can be adjusted only using \'volume up\' button, as \'volume down\' will be used as a camera button. For every correct guess, flip forward, and for every incorrect guess, flip backward, and get your score in the end. Keep going till the timer stops.

The expressions you capture during the game get saved to your gallery automatically. After the game ends, you will see a share button on the next screen, clicking which will take you to the gallery, from where you select the images to be shared. In case you forget to do this after the game ends, there is also an option in the play area which you may use for the same.
How to Play: Carefully look at the image/video on the screen (with text below it as the hint). Enact the emotion shown by the image/video. Tell your parents if they guessed it right :)
